fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Before the game starts, replace any player's role (not yourself) with a role of your choosing (cannot be a Discordian aligned role)
- At night, you may suggest 2 or more bastard events to happen, and the host must pick at least one
- rule 16 applies
- TOS hypno ability here

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - if this rolls, there must be at least one other discordian

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate everyone who doesn't actually exist.
